project_begin()
project_name("zlib")
project_version("1.2.13")
project_source_dir("zlib-1.2.13")
project_add_source_inclues(
	"adler32.c"
	"compress.c"
	"crc32.c"
	"deflate.c"
	"infback.c"
	"inffast.c"
	"inflate.c"
	"inftrees.c"
	"trees.c"
	"uncompr.c"
	"zutil.c"
)
if (LINK_TYPE STREQUAL SHARED)
	project_add_definitions(ZLIB_DLL)
endif()
project_end()
